text:
Two separate users on IRC reported build failures with APR < 1.4 with build errors in rotatleogs for apr_file_link which is 1.4-and-up.

I'm not sure what other 1.4-isms there are, but it might be reasonable to just bail out if an older APR is used rather than permitting it w/o default features X,Y,Z...
creator: covener@gmail.com
covener@gmail.com
text: *** Bug 52826 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

It's still failing with APR 1.4.6

is there any way to resolve this issue?
creator: erik.hoeschler@ivz.de

text:
It isn't possible to fail with apr 1.4, you clearly have some individual
deployment issue with your environment, eric.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
